text: Front-end developer who designs and builds responsive, user-friendly web and mobile apps, specialising in JavaScript and React.
UX/UI design experience creating user stories, user flows, wireframes, prototypes, colour schemes and UI components.
Skilled in building, integrating and testing back-end systems, including databases and APIs.
Experience collaborating with agile product development teams delivering UX/UI solutions for SaaS applications.
10 years experience as a designer, skilled in Figma, Adobe and other design / prototyping tools.
